verbs.description: [ARG0: John McEnroe] [V: says] [ARG1: that Donald Trump once offered him $ 1 million to play in a Battle of the Sexes with one of the Williams sisters] .
John McEnroe says that [ARG0: Donald Trump] [ARGM-TMP: once] [V: offered] [ARG3: him] [ARG1: $ 1 million] [ARGM-PRP: to play in a Battle of the Sexes with one of the Williams sisters] .
John McEnroe says that [ARG0: Donald Trump] once offered him $ 1 million to [V: play] [ARGM-LOC: in a Battle of the Sexes] [ARGM-COM: with one of the Williams sisters] .
